column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Ginny - Thank you very much for your 5-star review! We greatly appreciate your kind words. Regarding the timing of your appetizers -- I regret this happens from time to time
column2: usually when we are hit with a deluge of orders in a small window of time. Our ramen and tapas chefs have limited space to prepare these dishes
column3: and the majority of our tapas dishes require a minimum cook time before they can be served. As a result
column4: the best analogy I can offer is this: Our ramen line is like the deck of an aircraft carrier
column5: where we must send out bowls as quickly -- and more importantly
column6: accurately -- as we possibly can. I hope this makes sense
column7: and we will work hard to keep it from happening too regularly.
